item.title: Maine Becomes the Latest State to Sue Oil Companies Over Climate Change
item.description: In a new lawsuit, the state’s attorney general claims oil companies deceived the public about fossil fuel products’ contributions to climate change.

item.title: What Is Russia’s Oreshnik Ballistic Missile?
item.description: The weapon used for the first time against Ukraine last week is capable of carrying nuclear weapons.
